text: aur talaaq paee huee striyaan teen haiz (maasik-dharm) guzarane tak apane-aap ko roke rakhe, aur yadi ve allaah aur antim din par eemaan rakhatee hai to unake lie yah vaidh na hoga ki allaah ne unake garbhaashayon mein jo kuchh paida kiya ho use chhipaen. is beech unake pati, yadi sambandhon ko theek kar lene ka iraada rakhate hon, to ve unhen lauta lene ke zyaada haqadaar hai. aur un patniyon ke bhee saamaany niyam ke anusaar vaise hee adhikaar hain, jaisee un par zimmedaariyaan daalee gaee hai. aur patiyon ko unapar ek darja praapt hai. allaah atyant prabhutvashaalee, tatvadarshee hai
